channel.title: Muffins on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Muffins on Silence Speaks

item.title: Breakfast Blue Pt. 2
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: Oh, my good friend, I didn’t mean to leave. It wasn’t your fault, so no longer grieve! If I could, I would run back to your side. But, alas, a lack of legs slows my stride. It’s been over a year since I’ve last seen Your serious face and Chartwell’s cuisine. Often I think this is for the better \‘Til I shed tears as I read your letter. Fake tears, that is, for I also lack eyes.

item.title: Breakfast Blues
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: Lost my reason to wake in the morning Ever since you left me without warning. We’ve always seemed to have gotten along Now I’m wondering if I did you wrong. Lost my reason to give you thanks and praise. Each day that passes passes in a daze. The life I live is a life of decay. My happiness happens to never stay. I would have treated you so much better,
